short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fixes YouTube's inconsistent player controls. Right and left always navigate. Up and down always volume control.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension ensures that the left and right arrow keys always navigate the video timeline, while the up and down arrow keys always control the volume, regardless of the focus on the player.
